testcase.name: should send a message via messenger when any event fires
should not send a message from ignored device
should start a http server when created
should listen in a given port
should listen in default port when no port given
should return 405 not allowed on HTTP GET method
"after each" hook for "should return 405 not allowed on HTTP GET method"
testcase.failure: http.createServer.restore is not a function TypeError: http.createServer.restore is not a function at Context.<anonymous> (test\yash-http-message-gateway-test.js:15:27)

testcase.name: Should have no event listeners by default
Should have the event listener that was added
Should have multiple event listener that were added
should not fail when there are no event listeners and event is fired
should call single event listener when event is fired
should include the correct event data with call to event listener when event is fired
should call multiple event listeners when event is fired
should not fail when event listener does not have onEvent method and event is fired
should call twitter.post with status update containing message data when message is sent
should truncate message at Twitters message length limit when message is sent
should call zwave.connect with default USB device when started
should send startup message when started
should send success message when started successfully
should send failure message when driver fails
should call zwave.disconnect with default USB device when stopped
should send stopped message when stopped
should have zero nodes after start is called
should not have nodes with ids 1, 2, 123, and 456 when addNode has never been called after start
should have the node with given ID and all empty details when zwave fires node added event
should have three nodes with given IDs after zwave fires node added event three times
should mark node as ready when zwave fires node ready event
should set node details when zwave fires node ready event
should add node value when zwave fires value added event
should change node value when zwave fires value changed event
should send message when node is ready and zwave fires value changed event
should use node name in message when zwave fires value changed event
should use node manufacturer and product in message when zwave fires value changed event and name is not given
should not send message when node is not ready and zwave fires value changed event
should not send message when node is ready and zwave fires value changed event and new value equals old value
